long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Diverse & Equitable Business Resource (DEBRA) will let you know when the site you're shopping on is Black-owned, woman-owned, and so on. You can also let us know about diverse businesses we haven't heard of yet and help us spread the word about them.
